org.jooq
Interface SelectOrderByStep

All Superinterfaces:
QueryProvider<SelectQuery>
All Known Subinterfaces:
Select, SelectFromStep, SelectGroupByStep, SelectHavingStep, SelectJoinStep, SelectStep, SelectWhereStep
public interface SelectOrderByStep
extends QueryProvider<SelectQuery>

The order by clause step in a Select query

This is the final step in query construction, where you can add a order by clause to a query. This step is optional. You cannot proceed any further from this clause

Author:
Lukas Eder
